channel.title: Diablo 3 on Maciej Mróz Personal Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Diablo 3 on Maciej Mróz Personal Blog

item.title: Diablo 3 review
item.description: After a while of playing Diablo 3 it’s probably about time for me to publish my own opinion on the game. A warning: I was never really a Diablo 2 fan (at the time when it was big I was mostly playing a game called “Visual C++” :) ) so consider it a noob review if you want to :) Like many people out there, I started out as a Monk.
